thread.title: BRIEF-Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust Announces Update On Strategic Initiatives

title: BRIEF-Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust Announces Update On Strategic Initiatives

organizations.name: reuters) - wheeler real estate investment trust inc

text:
February 5, 2018 / 6:44 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust Announces Update On Strategic Initiatives Reuters Staff 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust Inc : 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST, INC. ANNOUNCES UPDATE ON MANAGEMENT TRANSITION AND STRATEGIC INITIATIVES 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST INC - BOARD HAS BEGUN PROCESS OF SELECTING AN INDEPENDENT THIRD-PARTY ADVISOR TO ASSIST COMPANY 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - IDENTIFIED ADDITIONAL OPPORTUNITIES TO MATERIALLY REDUCE OPERATING EXPENSES INCLUDING CLOSING CHARLESTON OFFICE IN SC 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST INC - ‍WILL PLACE 7 PARCELS OF NON-INCOME PRODUCING LAND IN VIRGINIA AND NORTH CAROLINA ON MARKET FOR SALE​ 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - ‍ TO UTILIZE PROCEEDS FROM REAL ESTATE ASSETS SALES TO PAY OFF ASSOCIATED PROPERTY DEBT, REDUCE LIABILITIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
